node.doctext:
DJ [nate] presents:

Herb is Pumpin -- [Slick Rick]/[Keith Murray]
Gather Round -- [Diamond D]
Proto Culture -- [Del Tha Funke Homosapien|Deltron]
Rockefella -- [Redman]
Neva Had a Gun -- [Krs One]
New York State of Mind -- [Nas]
Fresh -- [Jermaine Dupri]/[Slick Rick]
Know That -- [Black Star]
All Black -- [Big L]
I'm the Mutherfuckin' Man -- [Gang Starr|Dj Premier/The Guru]/[Jeru the Damaja]
Only out to Fuck -- Goldie/[Too $hort|$horty the Pimp]
What They Do -- [The Roots]/Humbert
Neighborhood Sniper -- [Cool Man Eddie|Eazy E]
Where Ya At -- [DITC]
Trouble in the Water -- [Dj Honda]/[De La Soul]

[% return unless isGod($USER) or $$USER{title} eq 'flamingweasel'; "Note that you shouldn't see this unless you are trustworthy:
NEAT FLOWS MP3"; %]
node.title: Neat Flows
